name: Petroleum and Petroleum Products
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale distributors of petroleum and petroleum products, such
as butane gas, crude oil, fuel oil, gasoline, kerosene, lubricating oils
and greases, and naphtha. Merchants that provide aircraft fueling
services are also included.
For retailers that sell fuel oil, heating oil, wood, coal, or gas propane,
use MCC 5983.
